directions.step:
Bring stock to boil. Add potatoes, onions, artichoke hearts, salt and pepper. Bring back to boil and cook until tender, approximately 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Fill blender half full and puree. Strain to remove strings. Return mixture to pot and heat. Stir in yogurt. May be served hot or cold. Yield: Serves 6
Reduce sodium by using half regular chicken broth and half low-sodium broth. >From A Votre Sante BY: Greater Baton Rouge Health Care Alliance-1988
